122 struct posix_trace_event_info {
123  trace_event_id_t posix_event_id;
124  pid_t posix_pid;
125  void *posix_prog_address;
126  int posix_truncation_status;
127  struct timespec posix_timestamp;
128  pthread_t posix_thread_id;
129 };
130 
131 struct posix_trace_status_info {
132  int posix_stream_status; //POSIX_TRACE_RUNNING or POSIX_TRACE_SUSPENDED
133  int posix_stream_full_status; //POSIX_TRACE_FULL or POSIX_TRACE_NOT_FULL
134  int posix_stream_overrun_status; //POSIX_TRACE_OVERRUN or POSIX_TRACE_NO_OVERRUN
135  int posix_stream_flush_status; //POSIX_TRACE_FLUSHING or POSIX_TRACE_NOT_FLUSHING
136  int posix_stream_flush_error; //set if an error occured on flush since last read
137  int posix_log_overrun_status; //POSIX_TRACE_OVERRUN or POSIX_TRACE_NO_OVERRUN
138  int posix_log_full_status; //POSIX_TRACE_FULL or POSIX_TRACE_NOT_FULL
139 };
140 
141 enum {
142  POSIX_STREAM_STATUS_MASK = (1<<0),
143  POSIX_STREAM_FULL_STATUS_MASK = (1<<1),
144  POSIX_STREAM_OVERRUN_STATUS_MASK = (1<<2),
145  POSIX_STREAM_FLUSH_STATUS_MASK = (1<<3),
146  POSIX_STREAM_FLUSH_ERROR_MASK = (1<<4),
147  POSIX_STREAM_LOG_OVERRUN_STATUS_MASK = (1<<5),
148  POSIX_STREAM_LOG_FULL_STATUS_MASK = (1<<6),
149 };
